member.summary: Field name

member.summary: MaxLenght. If type is other this property is ignored

member.summary: Field is nullable. Default true

member.summary: Field is part of the primary key

member.name: P:SqlGenerator.FieldDef.FieldType
member.summary: Field data type. See types:

member.name: P:SqlGenerator.FieldDef.Format
member.summary: Format for and . Ignored for other data types

member.name: F:SqlGenerator.FieldType.Auto
member.summary: Field type not set. Will try to guess for each read value.
member.remarks: When is and all scaned rows are null, FieldType remains Auto

member.name: F:SqlGenerator.FieldType.Text
member.summary: If field has text or other field types have failed.

member.name: F:SqlGenerator.FieldType.Numeric
member.summary: Field has only numeric values. Can be integer, float.... For text sources, decimal separator is the system default

member.name: F:SqlGenerator.FieldType.DateTime
member.summary: Field seems to have date or date time values.
member.remarks: Do not support formats with month names. Date separator can be [/], [-] or [.] Hour separator is [:] Detect formats like yyyy-mm-dd, mm-dd-yyyy, dd-mm-yyyy. With year in 2 or 4 digits, and day and month with 1 or 2 digits Hour part can be hh:mm with 1 or 2 digits. Any trailing chars will be considered seconds part, which allow milliseconds 12 hours format with am/pm not allowed. Please use allways 24 hours format

member.name: F:SqlGenerator.FieldType.Bool
member.summary: Field is considered boolean as it has only 1 or 2 values (apart of null)
member.remarks: The field will contain the text values for true/false, separated with [/] If is not specified, allowed pairs are: true/false, yes/no, y/n, 1/0, -1/0, x/<space>

member.name: P:SqlGenerator.Specification.RowsToScan
member.summary: Number of rows to scan to try to guess the fields data type
member.remarks:
Depending on the value of
This field is mandatory/>
If this field has no value or it is 0, will be and data type will be guessed in each occurrence. If has a value greather than 0, field data types will be guessed scaning up to the specified row

member.name: P:SqlGenerator.Specification.WorkSheetName
member.summary: For Excel files, thw worksheet that contains the source data. If not specified, the first worksheet (by index) is taken
